.._exomaft:

ExoMaft API ReferenceÔÉÅ

class exomaft.maft_combine.TransmissionSpectrumProcessor(file_paths, output_dir='output', plots_dir='plots')ÔÉÅ

A class to load, process, align, merge, and plot exoplanet transmission spectra from different instruments including NIRISS, HST/Spitzer, NIRSpec PRISM, and a combined model.

Parameters:

  • file_paths (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary containing paths to the spectrum files with keys: ‚Äòniriss‚Äô, ‚Äòcombined‚Äô, ‚Äòarchival‚Äô, and ‚Äòprism‚Äô.

  • output_dir (str, optional) ‚Äì Directory where the output combined spectrum will be saved. Default is ‚Äòoutput‚Äô.

  • plots_dir (str, optional) ‚Äì Directory where the output plots will be saved. Default is ‚Äòplots‚Äô.

align_baselines()ÔÉÅ

Align the baseline (median) of all datasets to match the NIRISS spectrum. This is useful for visually consistent overlay plots.

load_spectra()ÔÉÅ

Load the spectrum data files for all instruments and convert units where necessary.

merge_spectra()ÔÉÅ

Merge all spectra into a single DataFrame and export it as a tab-separated file.

plot_combined_spectrum()ÔÉÅ

Plot the final merged spectrum including error bars where available and save the figure.

plot_overlay_no_errors()ÔÉÅ

Plot all spectra overlaid without error bars and save the figure.

plot_overlay_with_errors()ÔÉÅ

Plot all spectra overlaid with 1-sigma error bars and save the figure.

run_all()ÔÉÅ

Execute all steps of the processing pipeline: load spectra, align baselines, merge spectra, and generate plots.

class exomaft.getlines.Linelist(elem)ÔÉÅ

A class to process and filter atomic/molecular spectral line lists for specific elements or molecules, typically used in exoplanet transmission spectroscopy analysis.

elem_dictÔÉÅ

Dictionary mapping element/molecule names to their atomic/molecular numbers for identification.

Type:

dict

elemÔÉÅ

The element/molecule to extract from the linelist.

Type:

str

lines_dirÔÉÅ

Path to the base directory containing linelist files.

Type:

str

outlines_dirÔÉÅ

Path to the directory containing raw line list text files.

Type:

str

outlines_sorted_dirÔÉÅ

Path to the directory where cleaned and sorted files will be saved.

Type:

str

outlines_masterÔÉÅ

Path to the final merged line list file.

Type:

str

combine()ÔÉÅ

Combine all cleaned linelist files into a single master linelist file.

This method: - Iterates through all cleaned .txt files in outlines_sorted_dir. - Merges them into one master file located at outlines_master.

sortlines()ÔÉÅ

Filter, clean, and sort individual outline linelist files for the specified element.

This method: - Iterates through all .txt files in outlines_dir. - Parses each line to extract relevant columns. - Filters lines based on atomic/molecular number matching the selected element. - Sorts the cleaned data by wavelength. - Writes cleaned lines to new _cleaned.txt files in outlines_sorted_dir.

FeatureTracker module for plotting and exporting molecular absorption features on a combined transmission spectrum using a HITRAN-style .par linelist.

This module provides:

  • Load and parse transmission spectra

  • Load and process HITRAN linelists

  • Plot feature lines overlaid on a spectrum

  • Save output plots and line lists

Output:

  • plots/feature_tracking.png

  • output/feature_lines.txt

class exomaft.maft_feature_tracking.FeatureTrackerÔÉÅ

Class to track and visualize molecular spectral features in transmission spectra.

combined_spectrum_pathÔÉÅ

Path to the combined spectrum data file.

Type:

str

par_file_pathÔÉÅ

Path to the HITRAN-style .par linelist file.

Type:

str

plot_fileÔÉÅ

Path to save the feature plot image.

Type:

str

out_lines_fileÔÉÅ

Path to save the molecular feature lines.

Type:

str

moleculesÔÉÅ

Dictionary of molecules with HITRAN IDs.

Type:

dict

top_nÔÉÅ

Number of strongest lines to select per molecule.

Type:

int

bin_widthÔÉÅ

Bin width for clustering lines in microns.

Type:

float

alpha_linesÔÉÅ

Transparency of the vertical feature lines on the plot.

Type:

float

load_combined_spectrum()ÔÉÅ

Load the transmission spectrum from a tab-separated text file.

load_linelist_par()ÔÉÅ

Load a HITRAN .par linelist file using fixed-width formatting.

Returns:

DataFrame containing molecular lines and converted wavelengths.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

plot_and_save()ÔÉÅ

Create the feature line plot, save the figure and output the feature lines.
